quest.name: Just the Two of Us
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
This timid townsviis would like to take you somewhere.

dialogue.name: VIIS03485
dialogue.text: Are you not Forename? One of the allies of Ronka?

dialogue.name: VIIS03485
dialogue.text: It is an honor. I was hoping we would meet, actually. There is a place here in the Greatwood I would very much like to show you.

dialogue.name: VIIS03485
dialogue.text: It is a place of leisure, where I hope you might be at ease, if only for a short while. Though I am afraid you cannot reach it on foot. Have you an amaro or perhaps a jaculus to carry you? If so, follow me to the west of the Wild Fete.

dialogue.name: VIIS03485
dialogue.text: Is it not beautiful? The canopy above is like a sieve, leaving only clean rainwater to fall and collect here.

dialogue.name: VIIS03485
dialogue.text: Here in the calm and quiet of the woods, you can close your eyes, take a deep breath, and let your troubles drift away.

dialogue.name: VIIS03485
dialogue.text: The best part of all, is no one knows of this place save for me, my sister...and you. If you ever have need of respite, please do make use of this spring.

dialogue.name: VIIS03485
dialogue.text: Now then, I should return before the others notice my absence. You are free to stay as long as you like.

dialogue.name: VIIS03485
dialogue.text: How do you feel? Refreshed, I hope.

dialogue.name: VIIS03485
dialogue.text: Wonderful. You have done so much for us, you have more than earned a moment of rest.

dialogue.name: VIIS03485
dialogue.text: Duty weighs heavy on your mind, I see. When your work is complete, I pray you find a moment of rest.

dialogue.name: VIIS03485
dialogue.text: Here. A small gift for humoring me.

dialogue.name: VIIS03485
dialogue.text: Take care, ally of Ronka. May the blessings of the wood be upon you.
